welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Echternach, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bitburg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free by requesting a password at the information desk.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Findel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Findel Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spangdahlem Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
